name: I AM (a small) LEGION (of 9)
description:
In this game you will need the help of your ghosts in order to make it to the end of the level.

use WASD to move
SHIFT to run
Aim with the Mouse
Shoot with left Clic
Press " Y " to restart from scratch

Code, graphics, and sound design by me.

Except from the player model and animations wich is from Mixamo.
